Name: Adnominal intensifier
Description: This parameter shows the most important adnominal self-intensifier in the language, including some information on how it is used grammatically.

Name: Exclusive intensifier
Description: This parameter shows the exclusive intensifier (as in 'I managed to do it myself').

Name: Reflexivizer
Description: This parameter gives the most important reflexive-marking element of the language.

Name: Attributive intensifier (‘own’)
Description: This parameter gives the form of the attributive intensifier (as in 'She brought her own cake.')

Name: Scalar focus particle (‘even’)
Description: This parameter gives the form of the scalar additive focus particle, corresponding to 'even'.
